# CreateHttpContent.TextPlain method

Create a PlainHttpContent.

```csharp
public static HttpContent TextPlain(string content, Encoding? encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| content | Body content. |
| encoding | Optional Encoding. Defaults to UTF8. |

## Return Value

HttpContent
